content: last 21 sts k2 yo k1 4 times k3 ssk 4 switch to mc cut cc or carry cc times k2tog k1 row 13 k1 kfb k to last 3 sts k2tog k1 2nd repeat k1 kfb *k2 yo k1 4 times row 14 k3 p until last 3 sts k1 kfb k1 k3 ssk 4 times k1* repeat from * to * until last 7 sts k4 k2tog k1 switch to cc cut mc 3rd repeat k1 kfb *k2 yo k1 4 times row 15 k1 kfb k to last 3 sts k2tog k1 k3 ssk 4 times k1* repeat from * to * row 16 k to last 3 sts kfb k1 until last 16 sts k2 yo k1 3 times k1 254 total row 130 sts ssk 3 times k1 k2tog k1 bind off loosely and block your shawl row 9 k1 kfb *k2 k1 yo 4 times k3 ssk 4 times k1* repeat from * to * until last 3 sts k2tog k1 2nd repeat k1 kfb *k2 k1 yo 4 times k3 ssk 4 times k1* repeat from * to * until last 13 sts k2 k1 yo 2 times k2 ssk 2 times k2tog k1 3rd repeat k1 kfb *k2 k1 yo 4 times k3 ssk 4 times k1* repeat from * to * until last 15 sts k2 k1 yo 3 times k1 ssk 3 times k2tog k1 sunmelt shawlette 5 pattern by rachael huffman of moonvale creations this pattern is available for free and should not be sold section 4 waves at sunset chart repeat row 1 through row 12 two more times following the written directions for each repeat of each row follow written directions for row 13 through row 16 on page 5 then bind off loosely and block your shawl wear your new shawl to the beach as you watch the sun set over the water have questions or feedback find me on ravelry as moonvale creations or on instagram as @moonvale_creations sunmelt shawlette 6 pattern by rachael huffman of moonvale creations this pattern is available for free and should not be sold
